Name: Mosaic Hearts Prototype Demo
About the game: Jonn returns to his hometown and finds it in the middle of a territory war! Jonn and a girl out for revenge, Mary, team up to try and stop it! Jonn teams up with each boss that he faces to become strong enough to take down the final boss, Noel! EVERY enemy is a (potential) new best friend! Fight each boss, gain them as an ally, explore, and platform your way through each level. Build a strong group that can take down the final boss, Noel Weisburg. ​In the game, you can:​ Customize your combos! Make friends of your enemies​ Interact with funny unique characters! Cook food to help you grow stronger! Never read this list again!​
